components.description:
A hand shown pressing against the head of a person, commonly written as facepalm. Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.

May be used in a similar context to the acronym SMH (shaking my head), or in relation to the Picard Facepalm meme.
components.title: Face Palm

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a man, commonly written as facepalm. Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.
title: Man Facepalming

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Facepalming emoji is a sequence of the ?? Face Palm, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 emojis. These are combined using a zero http://emojipedia.org/man-facepalming/
emoji_net_data.name: man facepalming

bn:13611656v: To bring the palm of one's hand to one's face as an expression of mixed humor and disbelief or disgust or shame, for example, when one is caught off-guard with a particularly bad pun.
Bring the face to the palm of the hand.

bn:13611657v: To bring one's face down to one's cupped hand or hands.
Bring the palm of the hand to the face.

bn:00028425n: Doubt, a status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision.
Doubt is uncertainty in the context of trust, action, decision or belief.
The state of being unsure of something
A status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision
Challenge about the truth or accuracy of a matter.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00923969n: A gesture of bringing one palm or both palms to the face, with various interpretations.
A facepalm is the physical gesture of placing one's hand flat across one's face or lowering one's face into one's hand or hands.
Bring the palm of the hand to the face.

bn:00033794n: A state of physical and/or mental weakness and a lack of vigor.
Fatigue is a subjective feeling of tiredness which is distinct from weakness, and has a gradual onset.
A weariness caused by exertion; exhaustion.
Temporary loss of strength and energy resulting from hard physical or mental work
Range of afflictions, usually associated with physical and/or mental weakness
Any one of several other medical conditions that cause lethargy
